text: Gramina loka mhanatata ki amhi imana rakhale. (Tumhi) sanga ki, tumhi imana rakhale nahi, parantu tumhi ase mhana ki amhi islamaca svikara kela (virodha soduna ajnadharaka jhalota) vastavika ajunaparyanta imana tumacya hrdayata dakhala jhaleca nahi. Jara tumhi allaha ani tyacya paigambarace ajnapalana karu lagala tara allaha tumacya karmammadhuna kahica ghatavinara nahi. Nihsansaya, allaha motha mapha karanara daya karanara ahe
